content: Which famous composer, born in Germany in 1685, is known for works such as the Brandenburg Concertos, the Mass in B Minor, and the St. Matthew Passion?

Johann Sebastian Bach, born in Eisenach, Germany, in 1685, is renowned for his significant contributions to Baroque music. Some of his most celebrated works include the Brandenburg Concertos, the Mass in B Minor, and the St. Matthew Passion. His compositions are known for their intellectual depth, technical command, and artistic beauty, making him one of the most influential composers in the history of Western music.
